short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces any text related to UGA(sic) with various insults.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome Extension that replaces all mentions of UGA(sic) with various random insults.

Source code: https://github.com/rockenman1234/Buzz_off

Bee icons created by dreamicons - Flaticon: https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/bee

This extension is in no way supported or endorsed by The Georgia Institute of Technology, or The University of Georgia; unless otherwise noted.
